physical_examinations.vital_signs: Normal heart rate and rhythm; temperature, respiratory rate, and remainder of general examination were normal.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Frontal bossing, full fontanelle with mild pulsations; weight 9.9 kg, length 78.3 cm, head circumference 51.5 cm (>95th percentile); decreased muscle tone in legs, brisk 3+ patellar reflexes; no signs of pyramidal tract dysfunction.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient had previously appeared to be meeting developmental milestones until the last 3 months, when she stopped pulling to stand or attempting to walk and exhibited developmental regression.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Alert and interactive with intermittent vomiting and dry heaves. No abdominal pain or fever.
